name: Addiction Navigator
description: Kick addiction to the curb and stay sober for good with NotionAddiction Navigator is a powerful and comprehensive Notion template that helps you become sober — and stay sober.✓ Quit addictive substances and habits✓ Get clean, stay sober and avoid relapse✓ Organize your progress and journey in NotionWith its intuitive and user-friendly design, Addiction Navigator is a customizable Notion System designed to assist you in your journey of quitting addicting substances like weed, nicotine, caffeine,
features: Manage multiple addictions at the same time (setup dashboards for each); Automatic "Days Sober" and "Milestone Countdown" widget to stay on track; Quick access buttons to quickly check in, register relapse or set stop date; Symptoms timeline to help you understand withdrawal symptoms; Relapse action steps, pros & cons' and your why databases; Relapse emergency hotline database; Daily journal + relapse tracking; Fill out yourwhyand yourpros & cons.; Hit "Stop now" to automatically set a date to stopTODAY.; Your milestones & days sober willautomaticallycount and keep track
